resources.string: Please enter Top and Bottom text first
Please compare Top and Bottom text first
Difference characters or words will be displayed here

How to use

The app is very simple idea. To return the difference between two text. The main text is bottom text where you compare it to the top text to return what difference the bottom text has (Your main). 

For example


Top text

My name is John Cena (Our Top text)

Bottom text

My name is John Rokaaaaaaaas (Comparing against it)

Result

Rokaaaaaaaas


What happens here is that the app compare character by character and return the characters that didnâ€™t match compared to Top Text

You can auto count during typing so if you would count how many characters you are typing 

You can copy and remove with easy touch

Maximum characters to be entered in the text area is 200 only for now

Please let me know if you have a suggestion or report a bug. Thank you
